abstract: Chevron is fighting an $18.2 billion judgment and lawyers who claim the company has polluted the Amazon rain forest.
snippet: Chevron is fighting an $18.2 billion judgment and lawyers who claim the company has polluted the Amazon rain forest.
lead_paragraph: The Chevron Corporation failed on Tuesday to persuade a federal judge in New York to find an $18.2 billion judgment by an Ecuadorean court unenforceable, but the judge left an injunction against the award in place pending further litigation.

headline.main: Judge in Chevron Case Declines to Reject Award
